news.title: President issues statement following meeting with Brazilian Minister of Foreign Affairs
news.summary: The visit was the first-ever by a Brazilian foreign minister to Ireland.

news.title: Ella Eyre announces sophomore album everything, in time
SNL's Fred Armisen to release new album 100 Sound Effects
news.summary: Despite its title, the tracklist features 101 sound effects.

news.title: Country star Lisa McHugh reveals Functional Neurological Disorder diagnosis
news.summary: "I guess the stress and trauma of this last year and everything we’ve went through has finally caught up with me and my body..."

news.title: Irish cyclist takes Tour de France yellow jersey for the first time in 38 years
news.summary: "I'm just super proud to represent Ireland and wear the yellow jersey," Healy said.

news.title: Inhaler add Beflast gigs to Open Wide world tour
news.summary: Bandmates Elijah Hewson, Robert Keating, Ryan McMahon and Josh Jenkinson are set to perform across Europe, the US and Asia.

news.title: Dave Lofts announces headline Irish tour
news.summary: The Wicklow singer-songwriter supported The Wolfe Tones at their final show in Limerick’s Thomand Park last weekend.

news.title: KNEECAP respond to Disturbed frontman David Draiman
Supergrass at Iveagh Gardens (Photos)
news.summary: Iconic English rock band Supergrass played the Iveagh Gardens on Sunday 13th July, delivering a brilliant performance full of hits from their discography, including classics from their 1995 album I Should Coco.
